inclusion.criterion: Healthy singleton term born infants of appropriate size for gestational age (AGA)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: according to the Centers for Disease Control growth charts based on weight at birth
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: between the 5th and 95th percentiles for sex
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: This allows us to assess growth and bone mineral accretion without bias of intrauterine growth restriction.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Infants of mothers with history of gestational diabetes or hypertension in pregnancy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: malabsorption syndromes due to malabsorption of vitamin D (celiac disease, Crohn's etc.)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical history is unremarkable.
